doc.title: Die Cadillac Ranch Geschichte
doc.plot: Hollywood, a place recalling associations like few other places: hope, glory, money, death. By night it turns into a neverending ocean of lights, billboards and halos. The total commercial. Selling a dream that doesn't exist. Downtown LA lives Joni, a singer. On TV they've got videos running by 'Ant Farm': the 'Media Burn', who is taking action against the commercial American TV, and 'Caddilac Ranch', reporting from the first monument dedicated to the American Dream. The other side of America. On the legendary 'Route 66' Joni is drives a '59 Caddilac from California through Arizona and New Mexico to 'Caddilac Ranch' in Texas.
